code:
---
template_name: "mindmap-template"
description: "Mind map template for hierarchical information organization"
variables:
  title: "Main Topic"
  branches:
    - name: "Branch 1"
      subbranches: ["Sub 1.1", "Sub 1.2", "Sub 1.3"]
    - name: "Branch 2"
      subbranches: ["Sub 2.1", "Sub 2.2"]
    - name: "Branch 3"
      subbranches: ["Sub 3.1", "Sub 3.2", "Sub 3.3", "Sub 3.4"]
---

mindmap
  root(({{title}}))
    {% for branch in branches %}
    {{branch.name}}
      {% for sub in branch.subbranches %}
      {{sub}}
      {% endfor %}
    {% endfor %}
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
